## Introduction

```{r}
library(pastecs)
library(tidyverse)
options(scipen=100)
options(digits=2)

DIL_1 <- read.csv2('data/DIL_1.csv', header=TRUE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE, sep=";", dec=",", row.names="Dosisname")

as_tibble(DIL_1)

DIL_1 <- DIL_1 %>% 
  select(Mittelwert, D_99, D_95, D_1, D_max, D_min)

df <- data.frame(DIL_1)


stat.desc(df)


```
